content.prompt: Scholars theorize the moai on platform (ahu) had a protective function based on their upward-tilted gaze and the

choices.label: use of marble quarried from a sacred mountain
placement of the figures with their backs to the ocean
representation of detailed portraits of individual rulers
orientation facing outward toward neighboring islands

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
